description:
After participating in the three-legged race with Mami, Honda believes they`ve grown closer. However, when he asks her out on a date, she says... With more opportunities to hang out as a foursome with Mishima and Miharu, Honda is glad to be spending more time with her.
When Mami says she wants to thank Honda for helping her train for the three-legged race, Honda suggests a group date with Mishima and Miharu, but Mami`s attitude towards Honda is as disinterested as ever...
Source: crunchyroll
